sentences.sContent: the lenient sentences handed down by some judges
sentences.sCn: 一些法官作出的宽大判决

sentences.sContent: School examiners say that marking has become more lenient in recent years.
sentences.sCn: 学校的阅卷人称近年来评分标准放宽了。

words.tran: 慈悲；宽大处理；宽大的行为

trans.tranCn: 宽大的, 仁慈的, 慈悲为怀的
trans.tranOther: not strict in the way you punish someone or in the standard you expect
